signal_channels.notes: Target specific strategic keywords that precede RFP release by 3-6 months. Query string construction: '("Head of Digital" OR "CRM Manager" OR "Head of Data" OR "Ticketing Strategy") AND [Entity Name]'. Exclude 'Matchday', 'Steward', 'Academy Coach', 'Retail'.

Scrape 'News', 'Media', and 'Careers' subdirectories. Look for keywords: 'Partnership', 'Technology', 'Fan Engagement Platform', 'App Update', 'Digital Transformation'. Ignore 'Player Transfer', 'Match Tickets', 'Kit Launch'.
Monitor for interviews with CDO/CTO/Commercial Directors. Keywords: 'Tech stack', 'Overhaul', 'Fan experience', 'Data strategy'.
Scrape 'Case Studies' or 'Customer Success' sections for mentions of the target entity. Indicates existing stack, useful for predicting renewal cycles.

signal_patterns.description: Hiring of 'Head of CRM', 'Head of Data', or 'Director of Fan Engagement' typically precedes a platform selection RFP by 3-9 months.
early_indicators: New C-level or Director-level digital hire
Creation of a new 'Data' or 'CRM' team department

signal_patterns.description: Migration from legacy systems (e.g., in-house ticketing) to enterprise SaaS (e.g., Salesforce, SAP) signals a need for implementation partners.
early_indicators: Press release regarding new primary data partnership
Privacy Policy updates indicating new data processors

signal_patterns.description: Major platforms (Ticketing, CRM, Jersey Sponsors) operate on 3-5 year cycles. End of term triggers RFP.
early_indicators: Case study publication marking 3+ years with current vendor

verification_rules.rule: Job posting must be Senior level (Manager, Director, Head, VP) OR explicitly technical (Salesforce, SQL, Tableau).
News item must contain keywords related to Technology, Data, or Digital Infrastructure.
